Articles.Content:
I do not know if this thread is dead, but I have a question.

In Enhanced Edition how do you transfer fuel. I have a station I need to put in orbit around the mun, but without a refuel mission it will be impossible.
Your question has been moved to the support subforum. I do not know the answer, but someone who does will be along soon.

In the top right, there should be a gas tank icon. Click the fuel type(s) you want to transfer, then you can transfer fuel from some tanks to the other without all the extra stuff like auto-strut.

On 5/3/2021 at 1:07 PM, PlutoISaPlanet said:

I do not know if this thread is dead, but I have a question.

And yes the console support forums are long dead. I feel like i'm the only one that visits it's grave.

1 hour ago, Wizard Kerbal said:

In the top right, there should be a gas tank icon. Click the fuel type(s) you want to transfer, then you can transfer fuel from some tanks to the other without all the extra stuff like auto-strut.

And yes the console support forums are long dead. I feel like i'm the only one that visits it's grave.

Thanks!
